Title: Object: The Death of Cleopatra
Description: The Death of Cleopatra Pen and brown ink, grey-brown wash, over black chalk
Producer name: Drawn by: Bartolommeo Neroni, called Riccio
Curator's comments: The attribution to Neroni is due to A. E. Popham. Lit.: S. Walker & P. Higgs [eds.], in exhib. cat., BM, 'Cleopatra of Egypt' , 2001, no. 370, p. 348
Bibliographic references: Walker & Higgs 2001 / Cleopatra of Egypt: from History to Myth (370)
Bate & Thornton 2012 / Shakespeare: Staging the World (p. 142; p. 143, fig. 25; p. 290)
